content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the taurage district court the case involves a dissolution of marriage between the applicant and the defendant the court has ordered the defendant to pay various fees and costs including stamp duty court fees and legal fees the court has also decided to award equal shares of the matrimonial property including the apartment basement and shared facilities to both parties the applicant is seeking a dissolution of marriage on the grounds of fault citing infidelity and abandonment by the defendant the court has allowed the action to proceed and must now decide on the division of the spouses community property the applicant has provided evidence that the property was acquired during the marriage and requests an equal division the court has also ordered the defendant to pay the costs of the legal aid and procedural documents the marriage is being dissolved due to fault on the part of the defendant and equal shares have been awarded to both parties the defendant is responsible for paying various costs and fees to the state

metadata.cost: 332 EUR  (stamp duty) + 8.96 EUR (court fees) + 315.57 EUR (legal fees) to be borne by the defendant
metadata.financial_support: costs of the legal aid and procedural documents
